ygData.subject: (Transmission to Nu)
ygData.msgSnippet: (A tight beam transmission emanates from behind the ENMP defense shield to Nu) Welcome, friend! Please, for your safety, do not try to cross the field

(A tight beam transmission emanates from behind the ENMP defense shield to
Nu)

"Welcome, friend! Please, for your safety, do not try to cross the field
prematurely. First we would like you, for our safety, to leave your weapons
on the outside surface of the defense field - they will remain suspended
there until you return. After you have done so, a five meter by five meter
opening will appear. Please then proceed to the camp site on the northern
most point of the south island, we will do business there." End transmission
